snippet: Officials at the California Department of Parks and Recreation helped keep millions of dollars in agency money secret for more than a decade, a report by the state attorney general’s office said Friday.
abstract: Report by California's state attorney general's office finds that officials at highest levels of California Department of Parks and Recreation helped keep millions of dollars in agency money secret for more than a decade; employees had feared that department budget would be cut if lawmakers found out.
lead_paragraph: Officials at the California Department of Parks and Recreation helped keep millions of dollars in agency money secret for more than a decade, a report by the state attorney general’s office said Friday.

headline.main: California: Report Documents Hidden Parks Money
headline.print_headline: California: Report Documents Hidden Parks Money
